rukus.text: nihsandeh, hamane us (quraan) ko lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) mein utaara
aur tum kya jaano ki vah lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) kya hai
lailatul qadr (sammaanit raatri) hazaar maas se uttam hai
usamen (har kaam ko poorn karane ke lie) farishte tatha roohî€¼ (jibreel) apane paalanahaar kee aagya se utarate hain
